article_title: Without resources, Nova Scotia's homeless are more at risk for COVID-19
article_description: Nova Scotia s homeless population is more at risk to contract and spread COVID 19 because they don t have the resources to follow public health rules of physical distancing  social isolating and proper hygiene  says an infectious disease researcher at the QEI
